DESCRIPTION: Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
Every #b6th card played will #yBloom, triggering any #yBloom effects on it or you. If that card costs energy, draw a card.
Trigger effects on you as if you played a 0-cost Status #bX times. This cannot trigger #yBloom.
#yFlowers replace the entire cost of one #gSkill, #bPower, or #rAttack depending on their color.
#yOases are #yUnplayable until drawing #bX cards, except the starting hand, while they're in your hand.
